GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles shown in descending order of date and showing amount of comments on each article

GET /api/:article_id:/comments.description: serves an array of all article comments shown in descending order of date and showing articles they refer to

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article based on the article id in the endpoint
